amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct the SEC to study and report to Congress on the prevalence of employee ownership plans within companies that include a flexible or social benefit component in their articles of incorporation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 114-414 to direct the SEC to study and report to Congress the prevalence of employee ownership plans within companies that include a flexible or social benefit component in their articles of incorporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 243 (Roll no. 57).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
